titles.title: Innovation Fund Act
Innovation Fund Act
To establish a grant program to increase the local housing supply, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Financial Services, and in addition to the Committees on Transportation and Infrastructure, and Energy and Commerce, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
